name: tyranitarite
effect: Held: Allows Tyranitar to Mega Evolve into Mega Tyranitar.
short_effect: Held: Allows Tyranitar to Mega Evolve into Mega Tyranitar.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Tyranitar hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
